title: condensed "Blade Runner" type
content:
Hi everyone!

Can anybody ID the "Blade Runner" type used here?  
Thank you!

[http://serialthriller.com/post/37816553342/blade-runner](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062453/http:/serialthriller.com/post/37816553342/blade-runner "http://serialthriller.com/post/37816553342/blade-runner")

Font: 

 Tommaso 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062453/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: mixedmoods

comments.content: [Tommaso](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062453/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=tommaso), donation-ware by Eli Horn for Lost Type Co-op
Thank you Ryuk for your quick help & reply!
